title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio showcasing full-stack development expertise with clean design, optimized performance, and seamless user experience. Features project galleries, skill demonstrations, and professional contact integration.

title: DevGrade - GitHub Skill Assessment Platform
description: Intelligent developer evaluation platform that analyzes GitHub activity to generate comprehensive skill assessments and hireability scores. Features embeddable React badges for portfolio integration and transparent, metrics-based grading system for enhanced recruitment processes.

title: Resserve - Future Message Scheduling Platform
description: Innovative productivity application enabling users to schedule messages to their future selves. Features intuitive scheduling interface, secure message storage, and automated delivery system designed to enhance personal goal tracking and self-reflection practices.

title: DecisionDex - Smart Decision Matrix Tool
description: Advanced decision-making platform that streamlines complex choices through structured analysis. Features customizable decision matrices, weighted criteria evaluation, visual statistics, and confidence scoring to eliminate decision paralysis and improve choice outcomes.

title: Streaksvr - Habit Tracking & Goal Management
description: Comprehensive habit-building application designed to foster consistency through gamified streak tracking. Enables users to create custom challenges, monitor progress with visual analytics, and maintain motivation through achievement systems and milestone celebrations.

title: Socially - Full-Featured Social Media Platform
description: Complete social networking application with comprehensive user interaction features. Includes dynamic explore feeds, intelligent follower recommendation algorithms, real-time engagement systems, content sharing capabilities, and robust user profile management for authentic social connections.
